Commandbutton0.Caption: git init
Commandbutton0.Hint: This command creates an empty Git repository

Commandbutton1.Caption: git status
Commandbutton1.Hint: Returns the status of the working directory and the staging environment

Commandbutton2.Caption: git add
Commandbutton2.Hint: Adds a selected file from your working directory to the Git staging area

Commandbutton3.Caption: git add - -all
Commandbutton3.Hint: Adds all new or changed files in your working directory to the Git staging area

Commandbutton4.Caption: git restore
Commandbutton4.Hint: Discard changes that have not yet been committed for a selected file

Commandbutton5.Caption: git restore '*'
Commandbutton5.Hint: Discard all changes that have not yet been committed

Commandbutton6.Caption: git rm - - cached
Commandbutton6.Hint: Removes a selected file from the Git staging area.

Commandbutton7.Caption: git commit -a -m 'comment'
Commandbutton7.Hint: Makes a commit and create a message for the commit in one command

Commandbutton8.Caption: git commit
Commandbutton8.Hint: Creates a commit with verbose comments, which is like a snapshot of your repository.

Commandbutton9.Caption: git commit --amend
Commandbutton9.Hint: Change the comment of the last commit

Commandbutton10.Caption: git log
Commandbutton10.Hint: Lists the commits made in this repository in reverse chronological order.

Commandbutton11.Caption: git reset --hard id && git clean -f
Commandbutton11.Hint: Jump back to a commit and remove following commits

Commandbutton12.Caption: git checkout id
Commandbutton12.Hint: Navigate between existing branches using commit-id

Commandbutton13.Caption: git checkout branch
Commandbutton13.Hint: Switch to the last commit of the specified branch

Commandbutton16.Caption: git branch -v
Commandbutton16.Hint: Shows the last commit of all branches

Commandbutton17.Caption: git merge aBranch
Commandbutton17.Hint: Merge a branch with the current branch

Commandbutton19.Caption: git diff
Commandbutton19.Hint: Show changes since the last commit

Commandbutton20.Caption: git diff --name-status
Commandbutton20.Hint: Show changed files since the last commit

Commandbutton21.Caption: git diff ./aFile
Commandbutton21.Hint: Show changes in a specific file since the last commit

Commandbutton23.Caption: git diff ID ID --name-status
Commandbutton23.Hint: Show changed files between different commits

Commandbutton24.Caption: git diff ID ID ./aFile
Commandbutton24.Hint: Show changes in a specific file between different commits

Commandbutton26.Caption: git diff Branch Branch --name-status
Commandbutton26.Hint: Show changed files between different branches

Commandbutton27.Caption: git diff ID ID ./aFile
Commandbutton27.Hint: Show changes in a specific file in different branches
